channel.title: [PI] Fixing PK system need help plz(:
channel.description: hello i need help fixin my pk system. when some one pks someone they get a message that they have killed the player twice in arow, but they havent. how can i fix that or take out the limit on how many times they can kill one another? plz help. willing to give my lvl 89 runescape account for this help. plz and thank you to who ever is willing to help me(:.
